# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Boiler and steam engine at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) 
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)

- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)

- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the required ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler or other power source before using it.
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before using it.
### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged into electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before using it.
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Ensure that the belt group has items before using it.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the given execution logs.
